title: Casey, Crime Photographer
additional-notes: A note in the January-June 1977 CCE Periodicals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information.  The renewal for the first issue was recorded in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, and was filed in 1977.
This comic book series used characters introduced in earlier magazine, film, and radio stories beginning in 1934.
